arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold mural vandalised ahead of Anfield return with Real Madrid
arts.sum: White paint was thrown over the picture while the word ‘Rat’ was written several times.

arts.ttl: Father of Liverpool's Alexis Mac Allister Reveals Feelings Over Real Madrid Transfer Links
arts.sum: Carlos Mac Allister spoke in an interview with Spanish publication AS, discussing the rumours surrounding his son and Real Madrid. Alexis' father, Carlos Mac Allister, spoke about the rumors and knows his son must perform competently to be linked to the Spanish giants.

arts.ttl: Liverpool v Real Madrid live: Alexander-Arnold mural defaced ahead of hostile Champions League return
arts.sum: Alexander-Arnold returns to Anfield as Liverpool host Real Madrid in the Champions League

arts.ttl: Three key battles that could decide Liverpool vs Real Madrid
arts.sum: Anfield is set to host one of the most anticipated fixtures of the UEFA Champions League group stage – Liverpool versus Real Madrid. Two of Europe’s most decorated clubs will meet again, renewing a rivalry that has produced countless memorable nights. arts.sum: A fascinating clash awaits later tonight as Real Madrid and Liverpool are set to face off in the UEFA Champions League in one of the league stage’s biggest games. Los Blancos have faced off against the Merseyside club several times in recent years and have usually had the upper hand over them. arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso made his reasons for snubbing Liverpool job clear after Jurgen Klopp decision
arts.sum: Real Madrid boss Xabi Alonso was heavily linked with the Liverpool job after Jurgen Klopp's exit, but the Reds later appointed Arne Slot

arts.ttl: Florian Wirtz defended yet again, this time by former boss Xabi Alonso
arts.sum: Florian Wirtz has gone through a tough time since his big-money move from Liverpool but he has certainly not been short of support as team-mates, former colleagues and Reds manager Arne Slot have continually backed him to come good at Anfield. Wirtz found the best form of his career under current Real Madrid boss Xabi Alonso at Leverkusen and the pair are on opposing teams on Tuesday as Liverpool host Los Blancos in the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Revealed: Virgil van Dijk contacted Real Madrid over free transfer before signing Liverpool contract as Spanish giants opted to pursue Dean Huijsen instead
arts.sum: Rooney said: "Virgil van Dijk and Mohamed Salah, they've signed new deals but I don't think they've really led that team this season. Liverpool have struggled for consistency this season despite retaining Van Dijk and investing heavily during a major summer transfer window.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid will closely monitor Liverpool mainstay in Champions League showdown
arts.sum: As Real Madrid prepare to face Liverpool in their highly anticipated UEFA Champions League encounter, a fascinating subplot involving Ibrahima Konate has emerged.
